name: Gazebo
longDes: You are in a gazebo on the rear grounds of the mansion. There is a peculiar scent here - the aroma of roses hangs on the breeze here, but there is another smell, earthy and somewhat rotten. The gazebo is a pristine white, but there is a middle plank on floor where the finish seems worn. To the West are the rose gardens. To the South is the rear entrance to the mansion.
shortDes: You are standing in the gazebo overlooking the rose gardens. There is a sweet and sour smell on the air here, like something good has turned. A floor plank appears off-color. To the West are the rose gardens. To the South is the rear entrance of the mansion.

features.name: plank
features.preActionDes: Looking closer, the gazebo has a plank that looks off-color towards the center.
features.inActionDes: You pry up the plank, revealing a dark hole!
features.postActionDes: You took the plank from this spot revealing a dark hole! I wonder what's down there.
